B1-B2 Level • Perfect for Students who are already able to have basic conversations

Intermediate / Conversational

Take your Dutch to the next level with advanced conversations, cultural insights, and communication skills for real-world fluency.

10-16 weeks
Advanced conversations
B1-B2 Level
27 per hour

What You'll Master*

Engage in detailed conversations on complex topics

Express opinions clearly with supporting arguments

Understand main ideas in complex texts

Write clear, detailed texts on various subjects

Handle most social situations

Communicate with native speakers naturally and fluently

My Teaching Philosophy

Every student is unique, and so should be their learning journey. I believe in creating a supportive, engaging environment where mistakes are celebrated as learning opportunities.

I also believe that learning a language happens primarily through Comprehensible Input. With my help and guidance, you will achieve this. But, and this is a big BUT, you will also have to put in a lot of time and effort outside of class. Don't worry, it's fun! 🥳 I will provide plenty of support and materials to guide you through the process.
💙

Course Features

Advanced conversation practice

Your Learning Journey

Weeks 1-3

Advanced Grammar & Structures

  • Complex verb conjugations
  • Indirect speech
  • Opinion expression
  • Compound sentences

Weeks 4-6

Conversational Fluency

  • Natural conversation flow
  • Idioms & expressions
  • Debate & discussion
  • Advanced prepositions

Weeks 7-10

Cultural Integration

  • Dutch culture & customs
  • Social etiquette
  • Grammar practice tailored to your needs

Weeks 11-16

Lots of conversation

  • Since this course aims to be flexible, there will be lots of space to practice
💬
